H0.text: During World War II, Japan occupied which part of the USA. Hawaii

H1.text: During World War II, Japan occupied which part of the USA. Guam

H2.text: During World War II, Japan occupied which part of the USA. Midway Island

H3.text: During World War II, Japan occupied which part of the USA. Aleutine

A4.text: The Japanese occupation of Guam was the period in the history of Guam between 1941 and 1944 when Imperial Japanese forces occupied Guam during World War II.

A5.text: The island was renamed ÅŒmiya-Jima ('Great Shrine Island').
